summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSG LLC. It details transportation charges, special handling fees, and provides information on how to manage shipping and request adjustments. The invoice includes multiple entries for shipments made in early January 2003.

persons.name: Jack Chryatero
persons.context: Jack Chryatero is listed as the sender for one of the FedEx shipments detailed in the invoice.

events.title: Shipment Pickup

keyFacts: The invoice is numbered 4-535-18993 and dated January 17, 2003.
The total charges for the invoice amount to USD 22.17.
Multiple shipments were made by NYSG LLC during early January 2003, with various recipients.
The invoice includes details about transportation charges and fuel surcharges for the shipments.
There are references to FedEx's shipping management services and adjustment requests.
